column4: Hello. Anyone knows how i can disable powernowd so i can have my CPU running at full speed for a while ?
I'm making renders with blender, and my CPU is stuck at 800mhz....
thing... sorry... i'm tierd... doing lot of mistakes :(
change it to max speed you would like it to bee when on battery
It doesn't work. In fact when i start rendering, it goes to 1.8Ghz, and then after a while it slows down to 800Mhz
